explanation: Funds are required to procure spares associated with funding appropriated in the FY 2019 Appropriations Bill for Air National Guard Joint Threat Emitters. Congress added $40.0 million in the Combat Training Ranges budget line to procure six Joint Threat Emitters; however, $6.4 million of that funding is required for spares support. This is a congressional special interest.item. This is a base budget requirement.

Funds are available because they were appropriated as part of the FY 2019 $40.0 million congressional add for Air National Guard (ANG) Joint Threat Emitters. Upon further analysis, it was identified that $6.4 million of the funding is needed to support spares for the Joint Threat Emitters. Spares are more appropriately executed in the Spares and Repair Parts budget line item. This is a congressional special interest item. This is base budget funding.
